Carnage can't get into his hotmail inbox and sent me this post to 
forward to the RPG. He'll confirm it whenever Hotmail starts working 
again.

This is Carnage from this point on:


** Dinobot growled as Tavatron approached him and the small ball of 
fur on his nose, knowing that she was trying to help him but not 
quite wanting anyone near him at the moment. Glaring at the fembot as 
he stood there and watched her hand come closer and closer to the 
black ball of lint.
For some unexplainable reason Tavatron's sudden apology heightened 
his aggression and his eyes turned into slits. This was pathetic! 
Since when had he needed the help of others in a foolish situation 
such as this? It was...absurd! A grown man such as himself with a 
history of bloodshed, seeming helpless just because a black ball from 
Hell landed on his snout! 
What foolishness!     However, Dinobot remained where he was as 
Tavatron leaned close and the small creature decided to use her nose 
as a target, the female jumping back and whimpering quietly in alarm.
Dinobot only snarled and rolled his eyes, getting sick of the little 
game, which this creature was deciding to play with the both of them. 
Thinking and wondering if it had any clue that it would be nothing 
but stray whips of fuzz on the wind if he ever got his transmetal 
claws on it. It was already stamped DEAD as far as he was 
concerned.    Dinobot jerked his head towards Tavatron as she tore 
her staff from sub-space, wondering if she was going to take some 
sort of revenge upon the ball-o-fuzz resting comfortably upon his 
most highly reflective snout. However, was not eager to see if his 
thoughts were false...or her aim. There was one fact, which Tavatron 
would have to catch up upon before she so much of moved a metallic 
muscle, and that was that if she hit him instead of the cat she would 
have a pair of transmetal fangs to try and pry off of her throat. She 
was indeed his friend, yes...but no bot hit him and got away with it.
Dinobot snarled in response to her telling of him to remain still, 
shaking his head to try and rid himself of the creature before moving 
it down and reaching towards it with his own claws. If it tried to 
swat him, he would simply squish it, then peel it off of his snout. 
Which suited him just as well.**
